name: The Joining Stones
description:
Game Developed for GMTK 2021

Get Close to another rock and press K to attach it to yourself.

CLICK on any Rock in the group to separate it from the rest and control it independently.

Press SPACE to jump.

Press R to reset level.

We had some issues with the sound integration and unity, expect a lot of cool after the voting! Also expect some minor updates to the UX

Programming and Game Design: Luis  Montaña

Art and Level Design: Jessica Dominguez

Audio and Level Design: Luis Molina
